archs.description: Change the architectures built on your machine by default.
archs.title: CIBW_ARCHS

before-all.description: Execute a shell command on the build system before any wheels are built.
before-all.title: CIBW_BEFORE_ALL

before-build.description: Execute a shell command preparing each wheel's build.
before-build.title: CIBW_BEFORE_BUILD

before-test.description: Execute a shell command before testing each wheel.
before-test.title: CIBW_BEFORE_TEST

build.description: Choose the Python versions to build.
build.title: CIBW_BUILD

build-frontend.description: Set the tool to use to build, either "pip" (default for now) or "build"
build-frontend.title: CIBW_BUILD_FRONTEND

build-verbosity.description: Increase/decrease the output of pip wheel.
build-verbosity.title: CIBW_BUILD_VERBOSITY

config-settings.description: Specify config-settings for the build backend.
config-settings.title: CIBW_CONFIG_SETTINGS

dependency-versions.description: Specify how cibuildwheel controls the versions of the tools it uses
dependency-versions.title: CIBW_DEPENDENCY_VERSIONS

environment.description: Set environment variables needed during the build.
environment.title: CIBW_ENVIRONMENT

environment-pass.description: Set environment variables on the host to pass-through to the container during the build.
environment-pass.title: CIBW_ENVIRONMENT_PASS

manylinux-aarch64-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
manylinux-aarch64-image.title: CIBW_MANYLINUX_AARCH64_IMAGE

manylinux-i686-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
manylinux-i686-image.title: CIBW_MANYLINUX_I686_IMAGE

manylinux-ppc64le-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
manylinux-ppc64le-image.title: CIBW_MANYLINUX_PPC64LE_IMAGE

manylinux-pypy_aarch64-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
manylinux-pypy_aarch64-image.title: CIBW_MANYLINUX_PYPY_AARCH64_IMAGE

manylinux-pypy_i686-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
manylinux-pypy_i686-image.title: CIBW_MANYLINUX_PYPY_I686_IMAGE

manylinux-pypy_x86_64-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
manylinux-pypy_x86_64-image.title: CIBW_MANYLINUX_PYPY_X86_64_IMAGE

manylinux-s390x-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
manylinux-s390x-image.title: CIBW_MANYLINUX_S390X_IMAGE

manylinux-x86_64-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
manylinux-x86_64-image.title: CIBW_MANYLINUX_X86_64_IMAGE

musllinux-aarch64-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
musllinux-aarch64-image.title: CIBW_MUSLLINUX_AARCH64_IMAGE

musllinux-i686-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
musllinux-i686-image.title: CIBW_MUSLLINUX_I686_IMAGE

musllinux-ppc64le-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
musllinux-ppc64le-image.title: CIBW_MUSLLINUX_PPC64LE_IMAGE

musllinux-s390x-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
musllinux-s390x-image.title: CIBW_MUSLLINUX_S390X_IMAGE

musllinux-x86_64-image.description: Specify alternative manylinux / musllinux container images
musllinux-x86_64-image.title: CIBW_MUSLLINUX_X86_64_IMAGE

repair-wheel-command.description: Execute a shell command to repair each built wheel.
repair-wheel-command.title: CIBW_REPAIR_WHEEL_COMMAND

skip.description: Choose the Python versions to skip.
skip.title: CIBW_SKIP

test-command.description: Execute a shell command to test each built wheel.
test-command.title: CIBW_TEST_COMMAND

test-extras.description: Install your wheel for testing using `extras_require`
test-extras.title: CIBW_TEST_EXTRAS

test-requires.description: Install Python dependencies before running the tests
test-requires.title: CIBW_TEST_REQUIRES

test-skip.description: Skip running tests on some builds.
test-skip.title: CIBW_TEST_SKIP
